price: Estarán recostados [sobre sofás], y pedirán frutas abundantes y [exquisitas] bebidas,
arabic: مُتَّكِـِٔينَ فِيهَا يَدۡعُونَ فِيهَا بِفَٰكِهَةٖ كَثِيرَةٖ وَشَرَابٖ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: muttakiīna fīhā yadʿūna fīhā bifākihatin kathīratin washarābin
